means: 地方行政长官，（东正教）大主教

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译 - 外国语 -... ... epanthous 长在花上的 eparch 州长 eparchy 州.

list.abs: magistra... ... - Western Magistracy 西区裁判法院; - eparch magistracy 地方行政长官; - Kwun Tong Magistracy 观塘裁判法院.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent. (denoting the governor of an administrative division of Greece): from Greek eparkhos, from epi 'above' + arkhos 'ruler'

means.word_mean: 1. a bishop or metropolitan in charge of an eparchy in the Eastern Church
2. the governor or prefect of an eparchy in ancient Greece
